effort_estimate.justification: Optimizing the observability stack ensures that it can handle the load and provide accurate data.

user_stories: As a system administrator, I want to optimize the observability stack so that it can handle the load and provide accurate data.
business_rules: Data retention tuning must be performed.
edge_cases: Optimizing query performance for different types of queries.

blocking_information.can_start_date: After INF-005-A, INF-005-B, INF-005-C, and INF-005-D are completed

additional_context.technical_notes: Ensure the observability stack is properly optimized.
additional_context.security_considerations: Secure the observability stack to prevent unauthorized access.
